root.message: The DISAGGREGATION field for indicator 8-4-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: ## Disaggregation The DMC indicator can be disaggregated into imports, domestic extraction and exports by a large number of material follow categories. At the highest level of aggregation biomass, fossil fuels, metal ores and non-metallic minerals are distinguished. DMC is usually reported for 11 material categories, DE for 44 material categories.
